<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<Envelope xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/dynamics/2011/01/documents/Message">
    <Header>
        <MessageId>d11ea350-099b-412e-b231-2a7229393548</MessageId>
        <PartitionKey>fr</PartitionKey>
        <Company>fm1</Company>
        <Action>www.eurofins.com/IBRA/GLCLIMSInvoiceStagingService/create</Action>
    </Header>
    <Body>
        <MessageParts>
            <GLCLIMSInvoiceStaging xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/dynamics/2008/01/documents/GLCLIMSInvoiceStaging">
                <Header xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/dynamics/2008/01/documents/GLCLIMSInvoiceStaging" xmlns:i="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" class="entity">
                    <BillToReference>A00199396C59</BillToReference>
                    <CCFCode>CCFTR000HF</CCFCode>
                    <CreditNoteReasonCode i:nil="true" />
                    <CurrencyCode>EUR</CurrencyCode>
                    <DMADocumentId>f4feae6e-3582-4e97-aa0d-71fc6ac58c6e</DMADocumentId>
                    <EarlyPaymentDiscountCode i:nil="true" />
                    <EurofinsCompanyCode>CGL005</EurofinsCompanyCode>
                    <IncludeTax>No</IncludeTax>
                    <IntercoOrderBUcode i:nil="true" />
                    <InvoiceDate>2021-11-15</InvoiceDate>
                    <InvoiceId>GENAURA21A0008108</InvoiceId>
                    <InvoiceRecipient>C000325145O3K</InvoiceRecipient>
                    <InvoiceReferenceDate i:nil="true" />
                    <InvoiceType>Invoice</InvoiceType>
                    <LIMSOrderId i:nil="true" />
                    <OrderMasterContact i:nil="true" />
                    <PaymentDueDate>2021-12-15</PaymentDueDate>
                    <PaymentMethods i:nil="true" />
                    <PaymentPeriod>N030</PaymentPeriod>
                    <PurchOrderFormNum>N/A</PurchOrderFormNum>
                    <ServiceRecipient i:nil="true" />
                    <SettlementId i:nil="true" />
                    <TotalAmount>10.00</TotalAmount>
                    <TotalTaxAmount>0.00</TotalTaxAmount>
                    <WorkerSalesResponsible>FIG7</WorkerSalesResponsible>
                    <Lines class="entity">
                        <AXSalesCategory>S01</AXSalesCategory>
                        <DefaultDimension xmlns:a="http://schemas.microsoft.com/dynamics/2008/01/sharedtypes">
                            <a:Values>
                                <a:Value>
                                    <a:Name>SUBBU</a:Name>
                                    <a:Value>5-GL0004</a:Value>
                                </a:Value>
                            </a:Values>
                        </DefaultDimension>
                        <InvoicableItemNumber>1</InvoicableItemNumber>
                        <LineAmount>10.00</LineAmount>
                        <SalesQuantity>1</SalesQuantity>
                        <TaxAmount>0.00</TaxAmount>
                        <TaxCode>EU-O</TaxCode>
                    </Lines>
                </Header>
            </GLCLIMSInvoiceStaging>
        </MessageParts>
    </Body>
</Envelope>
